inscription:
Inscribed in pencil on colophon page: à mon ami Bill │Serge

There is a card with a personal note, dated December 10, 2007, and inserted into front corner of red cloth-bound folder, to Bill Kosmas from Serge Lunal.
provenance: William P. Kosmas, London, England (d. 2017); Estate of William P. Kosmas, Minneapolis
signed: signed in pencil by author and artist on colophon page: JP Verheggen │ Lunal
title: Poème presque poème
